metadata.title: CVE-2018-6188 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
django.contrib.auth.forms.AuthenticationForm in Django 2.0 before 2.0.2,and 1.11.8 and 1.11.9, allows remote attackers to obtain potentiallysensitive information by leveraging data exposure from theconfirm_login_allowed() method, as demonstrated by discovering whether auser account is inactive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6188` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.8.7
python-django-common - 1.8.7
python3-django - 1.8.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.7').
